title: Counter-Strike 1.6 Steam - Steam RIP files
description: Hi ! I really thanks to you cuz you choosed my torrent and I hope you playing this game a long time as a pro player ;) Now , I'll start to say few things about this game. All files are original , except the emulator for non-steam game , which was made by a Russian man . You can fell the Steam experience , without to pay for the game ! Counter-Strike 1.6 is one of the most played FPS game in the history and this is played and in nowadays ! Firstly , before to be created "Counter-Strike" , was created the game named "Half-Life" ( 1999 ) , which was one of the most liked game , for that period , it was a game with a really good graphic experience . We can say so Counter-Strike 1.6 , is a moded version of Half-Life , but a version with more features and with a graphic more friendly for all players . Without anythings , this game is legendary and will be one of the best game ever ! I'll put few screenshots http://imgur.com/a/kFFLw
